org.ambraproject.rhino.view.article

Class ArticleAuthorView

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ambraproject.rhino.view.article.ArticleAuthorView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JsonOutputView

    public class ArticleAuthorView
extends Object
implements JsonOutputView
    JSON output view class for authors of an article.

    This class would ideally be named just AuthorView, but the code also uses org.ambraproject.views.AuthorView, and I thought it best to choose a distinct name.
